page.title: 11RECREATION_BRASS BAND
page.content: In Perranporth town, we have a brass band.It is not a big band.My name is Jamie Cowling and I play second trombone with another girl.I enjoy it. At the moment we are playing for the Flora dance.On Fridays we give concerts in Boscawen Gardens.In August we will be marching through the streets for the Perranporth Carnival. In the band are two tenor horns,three trombones,four cornets and two trumpets.Our conductor is Mr.Ray Smith.We play varied music including Glenn Miller,film themes,as well as the usual classic brass band pieces. The band was first formed in 1880, stopped in 1971,then formed again in 1981.The band has approximately 20 members in 1985.
